meanings.definition: The act of committing to a course of action beforehand.
meanings.sent1: Her precommitment to studying every day helped her ace the exam.
meanings.sent2: He made a precommitment to attend all the meetings this week.
meanings.sent3: His precommitment to always wearing mismatched socks made him the office fashion icon.
meanings.sent4: The team's precommitment to finishing the project on time was evident in their dedication.
meanings.sent5: The precommitment to daily exercise transformed her health and energy levels.

meanings.sent1: Their precommitment to donating a portion of their earnings to charity was admirable.
meanings.sent2: She made a precommitment to meet her friend for lunch next week.
meanings.sent3: The precommitment to always bringing homemade cookies to the office potluck made her quite popular.
meanings.sent4: His precommitment to being a supportive friend shone through in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The precommitment to saving money for a vacation motivated them to stick to their budget.
